title: Vital Gaming Trials Start soon, Need Top laners to apply

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hello Oceania Players,

Following the first post our organisation made; 
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/yHaTggvk-vital-gaming-looking-for-players-for-professional-2016-season

We are about to commence trials however we need more top laners to trail for the team, 
If you are **Diamond 5** or Higher and play **TOP LANE** please add me in game or comment on here NOW.

If you are **Platinum 5 to Diamond 5** and wish to play in another one of our teams, comment below we are still scouting players for that team.

Thankyou

replies.body: hi im plat 5 IGN GUPAETOS i wish to join one of your other teams if possible
Interested in the Plat 5 to Diamond 5 team
